title: Cabrillo National Monument: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging        The city of San Diego offers a multitude of lodging options. NPS Photo   Â   As the park is a day-use area, there are no accommodations located within Cabrillo National Monument.  However, your visit here may include an overnight stay at one of the many lodging establishments located within the city of San Diego.  To help you find a hotel, bed and breakfast, campground, or vacation rental, click here to go to the San Diego Convention and Visitors Bureau website for accommodations.  Please note that this link is provided only as an aid to your travel planning; it is not intended as an endorsement of any of the establishments listed.
